scripts.build: concurrently "cd play/client && npm run build" "cd editor/client && npm run build"
scripts.init: concurrently "npm install"  "cd mqtt && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install" "cd play_server && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install" "cd play && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install" "cd fetch && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install"  "cd editor && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd monitor && npm run start" "cd card_editor_solid && npm run start" "cd card_editor_solid && npm run start" "cd mqtt && npm run start" "cd play && npm run start" "cd fetch && npm run start"  "cd editor && npm run start_solid"
scripts.start_old: concurrently "cd monitor && npm run start" "cd card_editor && npm run start" "cd mqtt && npm run start" "cd play && npm run start" "cd fetch && npm run start"  "cd editor && npm run start"
